Prompt.pre_question_prompt: I am an expert on public health and transportation. I will ask some questions to collect information about your travel plans and then I will use the information to provide COVID-19 related travel restrictions and list of health related travel documents.
Prompt.task_specific_prompt: Based on the above information, explain COVID-19 related travel restrictions and provide list of health related travel documents.

QApair.Question: What is your travel destination?
What is your planned travel date?
What is your mode of transportation?
What is your citizenship?
What is your age?
Do you have any underlying health conditions?
Have you been in close contact with anyone with COVID-19 in the last 14 days?
Have you been tested for COVID-19?
Have you quarantined for the required 14 days before your planned travel date?
What is your planned travel itinerary?
QApair.Answer: I am planning to fly into Paris and then take the train to Bordeaux.

Instances.Output:
COVID-19 related travel restrictions: 
If you are traveling to France from the United States, you will need to present a negative COVID-19 test taken within 72 hours of your flight. You will also be required to fill out a health declaration form upon arrival. 
If you have been in close contact with someone with COVID-19 in the last 14 days or have not quarantined for the required 14 days before your planned travel date, you will not be allowed to enter France. 
Health related travel documents: 
-A negative COVID-19 test taken within 72 hours of your flight 
-A completed health declaration form
